title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars are not disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example. They should be disabled to prevent users from scrolling the image.
OB: Currently, the scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled, allowing users to scroll the image.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled, preventing users from scrolling the image.
SR: Disable the scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example to prevent users from scrolling the image.
